maqras.text: 90|1|main is nagar makka kee shapath leta hoon
90|2|tatha tum is nagar mein pravesh karane vaale ho.
90|3|tatha saugandh hai pita evan usakee santaan kee
90|4|hamane insaan ko kasht mein ghira hua paida kiya hai.
90|5|kya vah samajhata hai ki usapar kisee ka vash nahin chalega
90|6|vah kahata hai ki mainne bahut dhan kharch kar diya.
90|7|kya vah samajhata hai ki use kisee ne dekha nahin
90|8|kya hamane use do aankhen nahin deen
90|9|aur ek zabaan tatha do hont nahin diye
90|10|aur use donon maarg dikha diye.
90|11|to vah ghaatee mein ghusa hee nahin.
90|12|aur tum kya jaano ki ghaatee kya hai
90|13|kisee daas ko mukt karana.
90|14|athava bhook ke din (akaal) mein khaana khilaana.
90|15|kisee anaath sambandhee ko.
90|16|athava mittee mein pade nirdhan ko.
90|17|phir vah un logon mein hota hai jo eemaan laaye aur jinhonne dhairy (sahanasheelata) evan upakaar ke upadesh diye.
90|18|yahee log saubhaagyashaalee (daayen haath vaale) hain.
90|19|aur jin logon ne hamaaree aayaton ko nahin maana, yahee log durbhaagy (baayen haath vaale) hain.
90|20|aise log, har or se aag mein ghire honge.
91|1|soory tatha usakee dhoop kee shapath hai
91|2|aur chaand kee shapath, jab usake peechhe nikale
91|3|aur din kee shapath, jab use (arthaat soory ko) prakat kar de
91|4|aur raatri kee saugandh, jab use (soory ko) chhupa le
91|5|aur aakaash kee saugandh tatha usakee jisane use banaaya
91|6|tatha dharatee kee saugandh aur jisane use phailaaya
91|7|aur jeev kee saugandh, tatha usakee jisane use theek theek sudhaara.
91|8|phir use duraachaar tatha sadaachaar ka vivek diya hai.
91|9|vah saphal ho gaya, jisane apane jeev ka shudhdikaran kiya.
91|10|tatha vah kshati mein pad gaya, jisane use (paap mein) dhansa diya.
91|11|samood" jaati ne apane duraachaar ke kaaran (eeshadoot) ko jhuthalaaya.
91|12|jab unamen se ek hatbhaaga taiyaar hua.
91|13|(eeshadoot saaleh ne) unase kaha ki allaah kee oontanee aur usake peene kee baaree kee raksha karo.
91|14|kintu, unhonne nahin maana aur use vadh kar diya, jisake kaaran unake paalanahaar ne yaatana bhej dee aur unhen chauras kar diya.
91|15|aur vah usake parinaam se nahin darata.
92|1|raatri kee shapath, jab chha jaaye
92|2|tatha din kee shapath, jab ujaala ho jaaye
92|3|aur usakee shapath jisane nar aur mada paida kiye
92|4|vaastav mein, tumhaare prayaas alag-alag hain.
92|5|phir jisane daan diya aur bhakti ka maarg apanaaya
92|6|aur bhalee baat kee pooshti karata raha
92|7|to ham usake lie saralata paida kar denge.
92|8|parantu, jisane kanjoosee kee aur dhyaan nahin diya
92|9|aur bhalee baat ko jhuthala diya.
92|10|to ham usake lie kathinaee ko praapt karana saral kar denge.
92|11|aur jab vah gadhe mein girega, to usaka dhan usake kaam nahin aayega.
92|12|hamaara kartavy itana hee hai ki ham seedha maarg dikha den.
92|13|jabaki aalok-paralok hamaare hee haath mein hai.
92|14|mainne tumhen bhadakatee aag se saavadhaan kar diya hai.
92|15|jisamen keval bada hatbhaaga hee jaayega.
92|16|jisane jhuthala diya tatha (saty se) munh pher liya.
92|17|parantu, sanyamee (sadaachaaree) usase bacha liya jaayega.
92|18|jo apana dhan, daan karata hai, taaki pavitr ho jaaye.
92|19|usapar kisee ka koee upakaar nahin, jise utaara ja raha hai.
92|20|vah to keval apane param paalanahaar kee prasannata praapt karane ke lie hai.
92|21|nihsandeh, vah prasann ho jaayega.
93|1|shapath hai din chadhe kee
93|2|aur shapath hai raatri kee, jab usaka sannaata chha jaaye
93|3|(he nabee!) tere paalanahaar ne tujhe na to chhoda aur ne hee vimukh hua.
93|4|aur nishchay hee aagaamee yug tere lie pratham yug se uttam hai.
93|5|aur tera paalanahaar tujhe itana dega ki too prasann ho jaayega.
93|6|kya usane tujhe anaath paakar sharan nahin dee
93|7|aur tujhe path bhoola hua paaya, to seedha maarg nahin dikhaaya
93|8|aur nirdhan paaya, to dhanee nahin kar diya
93|9|to tum anaath par krodh na karana.
93|10|aur maangane vaale ko na jhidakana.
93|11|aur apane paalanahaar ke upakaar ka varnan karana.
